name: Centaur

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The centaur attacks with its pike and its hooves.

actions.name: Pike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit  reach 10 ft.  one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If this attack deals damage  the centaurs movement doesnt provoke opportunity attacks from the target for the rest of the centaurs turn.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit  range 80/320 ft.  one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Deadeye Shot (1/Day)
actions.desc: The centaur makes a shortbow attack with advantage.
